Packs • Services • Vehicles • Poisons Everything to set your world in motion: ready your PCs, travel, bargain, and take risks with clean, table-friendly cards. Contents: Packs: artist, burglar, diplomat, acolyte/cleric, scholar, explorer, underdark exploration Services: lodging, healing, transport, smugglers, mercenaries Vehicles: land, sea, beasts of burden Poisons: effects & rarity Perfect for exploration-, travel- and intrigue-heavy campaigns.
